the next speaker in the World Within Reach Speaker Series, which has also featured Gen. Colin Powell , Karl Rove , Governor Howard Dean , and most recently, Barbara Walters . The Speaker Series is an initiative by the SA to bring engaging speakers in public affairs, entertainment, and business to the University at Albany to gain insight from their unique perspective. So far all speakers have had a political background, with the exception of Barbara Walters , a journalist.
